description: This easy pasta salad recipe includes plenty of fresh ingredients and a zesty dressing for a healthier twist on this classic lunchtime favourite.
name: Grilled Capsicum & Pasta Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.5 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil
1 small red onion, thinly sliced into wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Quarter capsicums and discard seeds and membranes. Grill, skin-side up, for 10 minutes or until skin blisters and blackens. Transfer to a bowl and stand, covered, for 5 minutes. Peel and discard skin, then thinly slice capsicum.
Meanwhile, cook pasta in a large saucepan of salted boiling water according to packet instructions. Drain.
Whisk oil and lemon juice in a small bowl. Season with pepper.
Combine capsicum, pasta, tomato, onion, bocconcini and rocket on a large serving platter. Drizzle with lemon mixture and serve.
